title: Melee spell
data:
{{obsolete}}
The '''Melee spell''', referred to by the knowledge bots simply as "melee", is a fake spell used to make some particularly dangerous casters simply use their melee attacks instead of casting. In this sense it is somewhat similar to [[Cantrip]], except unlike that spell it does not cause a monster to waste a turn doing nothing; instead, the monster just uses its (usually less dangerous) melee attacks, or, if not in melee range, moves towards the player.

The melee spell is also the spell used by the [[rod of striking]].

==History==
The melee spell was completely removed in [[0.16]] with the removal of the rod of striking.
